stories.title: Technocratic Keynesianism: a paradigm shift without legislative change
Gameboy CT scan – design lessons learned
The American polity is cracked, and might collapse. Canada must prepare

stories.text:
It’s one of the best things that’s ever come out of the internet. But where was it first stated and how did it propagate through communities to become common wisdom?

From what I can tell, it seems to come from an Oscar Wilde quote. But I’m curious about where and how it was first applied to online discourse?
stories.title: Ask HN: What’s the origin of the phrase “Don’t feed the trolls?”
Ask HN: Hypothetically, What can Nokia do now to regain its past glory?

stories.text:
YouTube is full of videos of people doing tricks with Balisong butterfly knives, presenting them as cool and fun.

In fact Balisong knives are deadly weapons and illegal in many places if the world.

Search YouTube for butterfly knife tricks or Balisong and you’ll see videos with millions of views.

So when I asked my 12 year old what he wants for his birthday he said “a Balisong”.
stories.title: Tell HN: Thanks to YouTube, my 12 year old asked for a knife for his birthday
